Description: What is the best way to quarantine my 22yr old son who travelled by plane recently, has no current symptoms, when in same household as myself and teenaged son?
DialogueText:
Patient:
What is the best way to quarantine my 22yr old son who travelled by plane recently, has no current symptoms, when in same household as myself and teenaged son?
Doctor:
Read our blog post. Household members should stay in another room or be separated from the quarantined as much as possible. They should use a separate bedroom and bathroom, if available. Prohibit visitors to the home. You and the quarantined should each wear a face mask if you are in the same room. (3/26/20)  Read  https://www.healthtap.com/blog/post/caregiver-guide-for-COVID19-spouses-partners-contacts.
